original_text: Even of late my people is risen up as an enemy: ye pull off the robe with the garment from them that pass by securely as men averse from war.
korean_text: 근래에 내 백성이 원수 같이 일어나서 전쟁을 피하여 평안히 지나가는 자들의 의복에서 겉옷을 벗기며

sentences.original_text: Even of late my people is risen up as an enemy
ye pull off the robe with the garment
from them that pass by securely
